title: tour: error highlighting not working on locally run gotour  (new ui):
body:
on the new go-tour ui error highlighting works on appengine (goapp) but not on a locally
run gotour

What steps reproduce the problem?

1. go get code.google.com/p/go-tour/gotour

2. run the gotour executable.

3.  create a syntax error: in the tour playground and press shift-Enter or click run

What happened?

no error highlighting

What should have happened instead?

some error highlighting
